resources.string:
Alpha version


 MAndFileBrowser is a simple Android file manager. 

Author: Marc Nuri 

Released under GNU Lesser General Public License. 

Product home: http://code.google.com/p/mandfilebrowser 

With this program you can copy, move or delete a selection of files and/or directories. 
The application is in an early stage, please post your experience at http://groups.google.com/group/mandfilebrowser-users.
